MAX_VERIFICATIONS_NOTIFICATION: Closing contact. Reached max verifications number.
CAMPAIGN_HAS_BEEN_ACTIVATED: Campaign has been activated! Are you ready to work ? If not, pause will be enabled after {0} seconds.
DELETE_CONFIRMATION: Do you really want to delete?
ARCHIVE_CONFIRMATION: Do you really want to archive?
ARCHIVE_CAMPAIGN_CONFIRMATION: Do you really want to archive campaign?
ARCHIVE_TEAM_CONFIRMATION: Do you really want to archive team?
ACTIVATE_SCRIPT_CONFIRMATION: Do you really want to activate script?
USE_TAB_TO_MOVE_TO_NEXT_FIELD: Use Tab, to move to next field
CANNOT_IGNORE_ALL_MSISDN: Cannot exclude all numbers from calling without entering new number. Choose closing status instead.
ACTIVATE_CAMPAIGN_QUESTION: You are about to activate campaign, are you sure ?
CLICK_TO_ASSIGN_NEW_TEAMLEADER: Click to assign new team leader
CLICK_TO_ASSIGN_TEAM_TO_NEW_CAMPAIGN: Click to assign team to new campaigns
HANG_UP_MESSAGE: If you want to finish the call, please click on a phone button above.
NO_DATA_OR_NO_PERMISSION: No data or not sufficient permission
NAME: Name
MISSING_NEXT: Not all questions have next step defined
SCRIPT_REMOVE_MATRIX: Permanently remove this matrix? Script will be saved right now.
SCRIPT_MAX_COLS: Column count in this path exceeds answers number.
SCRIPT_BOX_IN_MATRIX: This question is part of condition matrix. Removing it causes reference data loss. Continue?
SCRIPT_BOX_CONDITION: This question has conditions defined. Adding matrix will clear them. Continue?
SCRIPT_CHANGED: To add or edit condition matrix save Your script first
SCRIPT_ERROR: We got an error, will check server. Please try again later.
SCRIPT_ERROR_LOAD: Cannot load from local storage, that"s so sad...
SCRIPT_SHORT: Your script seems to be incomplete, add some more questions, please.
SCRIPT_TESTED: If everything looks fine close viewer (back on right-top corner)
SAVE_BLOCKED: This Campaign is in use. You can"t save Your changes.
MATRIX_CHANGED: Data has changed. Closing will cancel changes, continue?
MATRIX_SELECT_ANSWERS: Before adding new elements, select values for new columns first, please.
MATRIX_SELECT_ANSWERS_UPPER: To select this - set values for rows above.
MATRIX_ADD_QUESTIONS: There is nothing to save, add some questions first.
MSG_ARRANGE:
This will arrange all question according to connections.
Are You sure?
MSG_CLOSE: Youre about to close this window. Click OK to confirm or CANCEL to go back to editor.
MSG_LOGIN: Your session expired. Do not close this window - log in again to continue.
MSG_TEXT_CUT: Too long text has been shortened
MSG_DUPLICATE: This connection duplicates default one and was cancelled
ERROR_LOADING_DATA: Unexpected error occurred while loading data. Try again later
SUCCESS_HINT_CONTENT: Success is a gained business goal, ex. sale, or filled survey
WORK_TIME_HINT_CONTENT: Amount of worked hours in selected range
CONTACT_RATE_HINT_CONTENT: Contact Rate is described as ratio: effective records to unique records fetched in selected range
HIT_RATE_HINT_CONTENT: Hit Rate is a ratio: success amount to unique records closed in selected range
SUCCESS_RATE_HINT_CONTENT: Success rate is a ratio: success amount to unique effective records in selected range
FETCHED_PER_HOUR_HINT_CONTENT: Unique records fetched to worked hours in selected range

EVENT_TYPES.FAILED_CONTACT.NO_MSISDN_TO_CALL: No MSISDN to call in current cycle

HTML5_AUDIO_NOT_SUPPORTED: Your browser does not support the audio element.

USER_TIMELINE_CHANGE.RESET_PASSWORD_REQUEST: User password reset request has been sent

UNKNOWN_SERVER_ERROR: Unknown server error occurred. Please contact our service desk.
UNIQUE_NAME_FIELD_MESSAGE: This name already exists. Please change it.
UPLOAD_FIRST: Before you continue upload files using 'Start' button for single file or 'Upload all files' button.
CLIPBOARD_COPY_DISABLED: Your browser does not support clipboard copy. Please type manually tag value into the message.

TEMPLATES.LABEL: E-mail template
TEMPLATES.NAME: Template name
TEMPLATES.SUBJECT: Subject
TEMPLATES.DEACTIVATE_SUCCESS: Template has been deactivated. It will not be displayed in call-panel.
TEMPLATES.ACTIVATE_SUCCESS: Template has been activated. It will be displayed in call-panel.
TEMPLATES.DELAY_ERROR: Delay should be integer value between 0 and 420

PLACEHOLDERS.LABEL: Dynamic fields
PLACEHOLDERS.TIP: Click the tag you want to copy to clipboard. You can paste it into the e-mail content or subject.

ATTACHMENTS.LABEL: Attachments
ATTACHMENTS.ANY_MESSAGE_LABEL: File can be attached to any e-mail
ATTACHMENTS.DYNAMIC_FIELDS_SEARCH: Search for dynamic fields in file
ATTACHMENTS.DEACTIVATE_SUCCESS: Attachment has been deactivated. It will not be send in e-mail messages.
ATTACHMENTS.ACTIVATE_SUCCESS: Attachment has been activated. It will be send in selected e-mail messages.
ATTACHMENTS.DEACTIVATE_MODAL_LABEL: You are trying to deactivate attachment
ATTACHMENTS.DEACTIVATE_NOT_ATTACHED: Attachment you are trying to deactivate is not used in e-mail templates. It will not be visible in call-panel and will not be send to customers.
ATTACHMENTS.DELETE_ATTACHED: Attachment you are trying to archive is used in e-mail templates
ATTACHMENTS.DEACTIVATE_ATTACHED: Attachment you are trying to deactivate is used in e-mail templates
ATTACHMENTS.ATTACHED_WARNING_2: attachment in above e-mails will not be send
ATTACHMENTS.NO_WEBMERGE_ATTACHMENTS: No active WebMerge attachments or service not configured. Please check WebMerge settings in CrazyCall or your configuration in WebMerge.

EMAIL_CONFIG.IMPORT_EMAILS_CONFIRMATION: This action will override all email addresses provided below. Are you sure?

API_KEY_SECRET_NOT_VALID: Incorrect WebMerge API key and/or secret
EMAIL_FROM_NOT_SAVED: Cannot activate template without sender e-mail
SELECT_SENDER_TO_ACTIVATE: Save sender e-mail to be able to be able to activate template
TEST_EMAIL_API_TOKEN_NOT_VALID: Error while sending test e-mail. Incorrect API token in e-mail configuration for this campaign!
TEST_EMAIL_SERVICE_DISABLED: Error while sending test e-mail. E-mail service not activated for this campaign!
TEST_EMAIL_NOT_INTEGRATED: Account does not have integration with e-mail service.
TEST_EMAIL_SERVICE_SENDER_REQUIRED: Error while sending test e-mail. E-mail sender is empty.
TEST_EMAIL_RECIPIENT_REQUIRED: Error while sending test e-mail. Enter sender e-mail.
TEST_EMAIL_TEMPLATE_ID_REQUIRED: Error while sending test e-mail. Enter template ID.
MAX_ATTACHMENT_TOTAL_SIZE_EXCEEDED: Maximum total attachments size exceeded. Deselect some files to continue.
UPLOADED_ATTACHMENT_ADDED: New attachment has been added to template
SAVE_BEFORE_SENDING_TEST_EMAIL: Save changes in template before sending test email
NAMES_NOT_UNIQUE: New names have to be unique. Please change it and try again.
EMAIL_TEMPLATE_HTML_BODY_EMPTY: E-mail html body cannot be empty
TAGS_SEARCH: Look for a tag or a group
REMOVE_NON_EMPTY_GROUP_CONFIRMATION: Are you sure you want to remove the group and all tags it contains?
REMOVE_NON_EMPTY_GROUP_WARNING: You're about to remove a group of {0} tags.
REMOVE_NON_EMPTY_GROUP_WITH_ASSIGNED_TAG: Some of them are assigned to agents. This operation can result in applying calling rules in a wrong way.
REMOVE_ASSIGNED_TAG_WARNING: The tag you're about to remove is assigned to at least one agent. This operation can result in applying calling rules in a wrong way. Are you sure you want to remove the tag?
SEARCH_FOR_TAG_OR_GROUP: Search for tag or tag group
TAGS_ALREADY_IN_USE: Some tags from group are already in use

MESSAGES.LOADING: Please be patient. We are checking if everything is working correctly.
MESSAGES.TALKING_FAILED_RECONNECT: Connection to server lost. Unfortunately your script will not be saved. Please back up the data and contact our support team.
MESSAGES.TALKING_WILL_TRY_AGAIN_IN_SECONDS: Connection to server lost. Next attempt will be in {0} seconds.
MESSAGES.WILL_TRY_AGAIN_IN_SECONDS: Call panel cannot load properly. Next attempt will be in {0} seconds.
MESSAGES.FAILURE_CONTACT_SUPPORT: Unfortunately we found few issues. Please contact us at support@crazycall.com in order to resolve them.

ERRORS.SERVER_CONNECTION_FAILED: Connection with our server cannot be established. Please check the quality of your Internet connection.
ERRORS.SPEAKER_UNAVAILABLE: We cannot access your speakers or headphones. Please check your audio settings and try again.
ERRORS.MIC_UNAVAILABLE: We cannot access your microphone. Please check your audio settings and try again.
ERRORS.MUTED_SOUND: Your sound is muted! Please check your settings.
ERRORS.CHECK_JAVA: It looks like you Java is set incorrectly. Please check your settings.
ERRORS.LOW_MIC_SOUND: Your microphone is set very low. Please volume it up, so your customer can hear you better.
ERRORS.LOW_SPEAKER_SOUND: Your speakers are set very low. Please volume it up, so you'll hear your customers better.

CAMPAIGN_NAME_EMPTY: Campaign name can not be empty
CAMPAIGN_NAME_EXISTS: Campaign with given name already exists
CAMPAIGN_SOURCE_ID_EMPTY: Source campaign have to be provided

AGENT_STATE.OFFLINE: Agent is not logged into campaign
